alert.note: Alert for Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:27PM CDT until June 26 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR WOODFORD AND NORTHEASTERN TAZEWELL COUNTIES... At 926 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Eureka, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Roanoke around 930 PM CDT. Secor around 935 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include El Paso. This includes Interstate 39 between mile markers 10 and 27. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
